page.title: 10STIBBINGTON FIELD CENTRE
page.content: Stibbington Field Studies Centre is owned by Cambridgeshire County Council and is a centre for county schools to use for both residential and day visits. The centre contains bedrooms, dining and social areas as well as classroom facilities. Most of the Centre's visitors are from the Peterborough area. Every year more than one thousand children stay at the Centre and a further thousand come for day visits. The Centre's courses are mainly concerned with Environmental Studies, but there are also courses in Biology, Geography, History, Outdoor Pursuits, Conservation, Photography, Video and Art. Most of the places used for study are within easy walking distance of the Centre.
